Quickstrike:





Quickstrike nearly fell on his chest, but he just caught himself. He coughed 
and gasped now that whatever had him stopped shocking him. He slowly let 
himself rest on the ground. He knew that the wires were still on his arms 
and head; he could see feel it.

By him, he could hear a loud clanking noise, like metal hitting rock. He 
slowly turned his head to the side and saw a huge metalic, strange looking 
wolf stomping towards him. Most parts of it didn't look like a wolf, but it 
had a wolfish head. It had wings and feathers in some spots.

Quickstrike's eyes went wide. He struggled to get to his feet, but he was 
too weak to move. He could barely even scream.
